segments.text: Cute ... Here . These beans are already ground . Now for step three
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You have to brew the grinds while they're fresh and drink it immediately for the best flavor .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK ! Hurry , then ! Here's my cup . I can't wait for step four !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , there is , drinking your coffee !
segments.speaker: S2
